>Construction of pLYC2
acquire oligo olyc4				
acquire oligo olyc2
acquire oligo olyc2r
acquire oligo olyc4r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc4,olyc2r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA2)
PCR olyc2,olyc4r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB2)
Assemble pcrA2,pcrB2	(Gibson, pLYC2)
Transform pLYC2	(Mach1, Amp)
